binding:binding.name: Velux Binding (1.x)
binding:binding.description: A 1.x binding for the Velux KLF200 Bridge. The Velux Binding interacts via a Velux Bridge with the different Velux devices like controlling window openers, shutters and others. For example a KLF200 can act as interface between the HomeAutomation and the VELUX INTEGRA products with wireless connectivity based on the io-homecontrol standard.

parameter.name: bridgeProtocol
parameter.label: Bridge Protocol
parameter.description: The connection protocol to contact the Velux Bridge with (either slip or json).

parameter.name: bridgeIPAddress
parameter.label: Bridge IP Address
parameter.description: The IP address of the Velux Bridge.

parameter.name: bridgeTCPPort
parameter.label: Bridge Port
parameter.description: TCP port of the Velux gateway

parameter.name: bridgePassword
parameter.label: Bridge Password
parameter.description: Password for authentication against the Velux Bridge.

parameter.name: retries
parameter.label: Connection retries
parameter.description: Number of retries with timing along the Binary Exponential Backoff (BEB) Algorithm.

parameter.name: isBulkRetrievalEnabled
parameter.label: Enable Bulk retrieval
parameter.description: Fetch the complete actuator information in a bulk.
